CONTRACT_ID: ITT_B - GRASS and LANDSCAPING - ST. ELEANORS PE
short_summary: the contract is for grass cutting and landscaping services.
description: furnishing all labor, materials, tools, and equipment for grass cutting and landscaping services at the DND site.
duration_in_months: .75 years or 14 months when combined with the 2 optional renewal periods
full_summary:
### ITT_B - GRASS and LANDSCAPING - ST. ELEANORS PE

#### Notice Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3901033361, Doc3937976721
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3901033361
* **Publication Date**: March 27, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 18, 2023, 2:00 PM (14:00:00)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

#### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Service)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: This bid is open to bidders that comply with the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### Contract Details

* **Contract Description**: The successful bidder will provide grass cutting services and landscape maintenance at the Department of National Defence site in St. Eleanors, Prince Edward Island.
* **Period of Contract**: April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2024, with an option to renew for two one-year periods.
* **Estimated Cost**: Between $100,001 and $500,000 (HST included)

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Timothee Beausoleil, Service Delivery Canada (SPAC/PSPC), Timothee Beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Tenders

* Bidders may submit their tenders electronically through the online bid submission system at http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15821064?extsite=MTU4MjEwNjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

#### Note

* This tender closes with no option to defer your submission.
